meanings.definition: Below the level of a virus.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the subviral particles under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The subviral infection was not as severe as a full-blown virus.
meanings.sent3: The tiny subviral organisms were having a party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was subviral, barely noticeable but still present.
meanings.sent5: The subviral nature of the bacteria made them hard to detect.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a level below that of a virus.
meanings.sent1: The subviral research focused on studying smaller particles than viruses.
meanings.sent2: The subviral characteristics of the bacteria made them difficult to classify.
meanings.sent3: The subviral jokes at the science conference were not very contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was subviral, spreading slowly but surely to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The subviral impact of the new discovery was felt throughout the scientific community.
